task.name: MON span extraction
task.description: Extract MON entity spans from the input text. Return character-based spans with start/end offsets into the original text.

rules.name: Extract Percentages
rules.description: This rule extracts percentage values, which are typically formatted with a '%' sign following a numeric value.

rules.name: Extract Monetary Values with Comma Format
rules.description: This rule captures monetary values in comma format (e.g., 1,234.56), possibly with a currency notation that follows.

rules.name: Capture Currency Considerations
rules.description: This rule captures common currency terms like USD, Euro, along with their formats.

rules.name: Handle Numeric Values (General)
rules.description: Extract general numeric values that could represent financial data, without specific formatting or units.

rules.name: Extract Specific Financial Terms
rules.description: Capture specific terms that indicate financial values such as 'Mio', 'thousand', and similar terms.

rules.name: Extract Detailed Numerical Patterns
rules.description: This rule addresses detailed numerical patterns, including those with potential subunits.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    # Handling monetary values with decimals
    decimal_pattern = r'\b-?\d+(?:[.,]\d{1,2})?\s*%?\s*(?:Mio|million|Euro|USD)?\b'
    matches = re.finditer(decimal_pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Extract Conditional Patterns
rules.description: Extracts values that depend on specific conditions or formats surrounding them.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    percentage_pattern = r'\b\d{1,3}(?:[.,]\d{1,2})? %\b'
    matches = re.finditer(percentage_pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Normalize Different Currency Formats
rules.description: Standardize formats for extracted currencies regardless of their variations.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    currency_pattern = r'\b(?:USD|Euro|%|Mio)\b'
    matches = re.finditer(currency_pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans

rules.name: Filter Extracted Values for Relevance
rules.description: This rule aims to filter out results based on contextual relevance, e.g., ignoring zero entries.

rules.name: Enhance Extraction of Complex Numbers
rules.description: Extract numbers that might be intricately formatted, needing specific approaches.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    text = input_data['text']
    complex_pattern = r'\b-?\d{1,3}(?:[.,]\d{3})*(?:[.,]\d{1,2})?\b'
    matches = re.finditer(complex_pattern, text)
    for match in matches:
        spans.append({'text': match.group(0), 'start': match.start(), 'end': match.end()})
    return spans
